name: Rock'n Robots
description:
My entry in Ludum Dare 36 , Rock n Robots is just a simple game of musical chairs with 3 robots and 1 chair. When the music stops your robot must get to the chair before the AI robots. Don't colide with the other robots or your health will drain. The chair may move once the music stops.

Keys : Space / Enter Start Game

Arrows : Move (when music stops)
